title: NINJA-IDE, an IDE specially designed for Python
summary:
One of the recurrent questions in all the Python communities around the
world is: "What is a good IDE for Python?" As answer to that question
NINJA-IDE born from a group of members of the Argentinian Python
Community (PyAr). NINJA-IDE is an Open Source distributed under GPLv3
license, cross-platform, lightweight, powerful and full of features IDE.
